title: Life and times of Atal Bihari Vajpayee - The Hindu
article_body: Former Prime Minister Atal Bihar Vajpayee, who passed away on August 16 at the All India Institute of Medical Sciences, was a skilled orator and politician.
description: Former Prime Minister Atal Bihar Vajpayee, who passed away on August 16 at the All India Institute of Medical Sciences, was a skilled orator and politician.
